name: Escape From Mad Robot
description:
You could Watch Trailer Before Playing Here

You are an astronaut who survived a colonial expedition. However, you are the only survivor. and the colonial exploration robots were severely damaged, resulting in All the robots having destroyed the colonists. you as a survivor must escape from the robot Don't let it catch you because if it catches you It will erase your memories and make you one of them.

How to play

Run away from the robot until you find the door and keep running to the spaceship and meet the Door and the end of the game.
